(:action cut ;  Cut an item and update its status
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (at ?item ?location) (not (cut ?item)))
  :effect (and (cut ?item) (prepared ?item))

(:action set ;  Set a parameter and update the state
    :parameters (?actor - entity ?param - parameter ?target - object ?context - context)
    :precondition (and (available ?actor) (not (set ?param ?target ?context)))
    :effect (set ?param ?target ?context)
)

(:action add ; Add items to a container or entity
    :parameters (?p - person ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?container) (available ?item1) (available ?item2) (at ?item1 ?p) (at ?item2 ?p))
    :effect (and (in ?item1 ?container) (in ?item2 ?container))

(:action serve_cheese_sauce
    :parameters (?p - player ?velveeta - cheese ?peppers - vegetable ?olives - fruit ?burner - stove_knob ?pot - pot)
    
    :precondition (and 
        ; Preconditions for cutting Velveeta
        (at ?p ?cutting_board) 
        (not (cut ?velveeta))
        
        ; Preconditions for setting burner and adding cheese
        (at ?p ?burner) 
        (cut ?velveeta)
        (in ?velveeta ?p)
        (at ?pot ?burner)
        
        ; Preconditions for adding peppers and olives
        (at ?p ?pot)
        (melted ?velveeta)
        (in ?peppers ?p)
        (in ?olives ?p)
        
        ; Preconditions for serving cheese sauce
        (burner_on ?burner low)
    )
    
    :effect (and 
        ; Effects of cutting Velveeta
        (cut ?velveeta)
        
        ; Effects of setting burner and adding cheese
        (melted ?velveeta)
        (in ?velveeta ?pot)
        (burner_on ?burner medium)
        
        ; Effects of adding peppers and olives
        (in ?peppers ?pot)
        (in ?olives ?pot)
        
        ; Effects of serving cheese sauce
        (served ?cheese_sauce)
        (burner_off ?burner)
    )
